EEGraSP.eegrasp.EEGraSP¶

class EEGraSP.eegrasp.EEGraSP(data=None, coordenates=None, labels=None)¶

” Class containing functionality to analyze EEG signals.

Parameters¶

data eeg_pos ch_names

Notes¶

Gaussian Kernel functionallity overlapping with Pygsp toolbox. This has been purposefully added.

__init__(data=None, coordenates=None, labels=None)¶

” Parameters ———- data 2-d array, where the firs dim are channels and the second is samples. coordenates n-dim array of the position of the electrodes. labels 1-d array with the channel names.
